sections.heading: End of the course
items: confidence in my skills as a designer and a developer
a beautiful personal website that showcases who I am and what I can do - something that will market me well to potential clients
one job (at least) to look forward to working on, as the start of the transition out of my current job

sections.heading: Five years
items: owner & operator of web design business
flexible schedule - able to take long vacations, or work 4-day weeks work when and where I want to
engaging, interesting work that I enjoy - something that I don't mind devoting long days to, especially when long days mean shorter work weeks
owner of 2-bedroom condo with a view in my neighbourhood
owner of a wirehaired dachshund named Little Joey Cora
flourishing work-life balance - lots of walks, lots of time with my friends and their kids, healthy meals at home
